verses.verse: To the <S%H5329>chief<s%> <S%H5329>Musician,<s%> A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H7892>song<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5337>delivered<s%> him from the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul:<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> I will <S%H7355>love<s%> you, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> my <S%H2391>strength.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is my <S%H5553>rock,<s%> and my <S%H4686>fortress,<s%> and my <S%H6403>deliverer;<s%> my <S%H410>God,<s%> my <S%H6697>strength,<s%> in whom I will <S%H2620>trust;<s%> my <S%H4043>buckler,<s%> and the <S%H7161>horn<s%> of my <S%H3468>salvation,<s%> and my <S%H4869>high<s%> <S%H4869>tower.<s%>
I will <S%H7121>call<s%> on the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> who is worthy to be <S%H1984>praised:<s%> so shall I be <S%H3467>saved<s%> from my <S%H341>enemies.<s%>
The <S%H2256>sorrows<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%> <S%H661>compassed<s%> me, and the <S%H5158>floods<s%> of <S%H1100>ungodly<s%> men made me <S%H1204>afraid.<s%>
The <S%H2256>sorrows<s%> of <S%H7585>hell<s%> <S%H5437>compassed<s%> me about: the <S%H4170>snares<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%> <S%H6923>prevented<s%> me.

In my <S%H6862>distress<s%> I <S%H7121>called<s%> on the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H7768>cried<s%> to my <S%H430>God:<s%> he <S%H8085>heard<s%> my <S%H6963>voice<s%> out of his <S%H1964>temple,<s%> and my <S%H7775>cry<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him, even into his <S%H241>ears.<s%>

Then the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1607>shook<s%> and <S%H7493>trembled;<s%> the <S%H4146>foundations<s%> also of the <S%H2022>hills<s%> <S%H7264>moved<s%> and were <S%H1607>shaken,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he was <S%H2734>wroth.<s%>

There <S%H5927>went<s%> up a <S%H6227>smoke<s%> out of his <S%H639>nostrils,<s%> and <S%H784>fire<s%> out of his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H398>devoured:<s%> <S%H1513>coals<s%> were <S%H1197>kindled<s%> by it.
He <S%H5186>bowed<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> also, and <S%H3381>came<s%> <S%H3381>down:<s%> and <S%H6205>darkness<s%> was <S%H8478>under<s%> his <S%H7272>feet.<s%>
And he <S%H7392>rode<s%> on a <S%H3742>cherub,<s%> and did <S%H5774>fly:<s%> yes, he did <S%H1675>fly<s%> on the <S%H3671>wings<s%> of the <S%H7307>wind.<s%>

He <S%H7896>made<s%> <S%H2822>darkness<s%> his <S%H5643>secret<s%> place; his <S%H5521>pavilion<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about him were <S%H2824>dark<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> and thick <S%H5645>clouds<s%> of the <S%H7834>skies.<s%>
At the <S%H5051>brightness<s%> that was <S%H5048>before<s%> him his thick <S%H5645>clouds<s%> <S%H5674>passed,<s%> <S%H1259>hail<s%> stones and <S%H1513>coals<s%> of <S%H784>fire.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> also <S%H7481>thundered<s%> in the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> and the <S%H5945>Highest<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> his <S%H6963>voice;<s%> <S%H1259>hail<s%> stones and <S%H1513>coals<s%> of <S%H784>fire.<s%>
Yes, he <S%H7971>sent<s%> out his <S%H2671>arrows,<s%> and <S%H6327>scattered<s%> them; and he <S%H7232>shot<s%> out <S%H1300>lightning,<s%> and <S%H1949>discomfited<s%> them.

Then the <S%H650>channels<s%> of <S%H4325>waters<s%> were <S%H7200>seen,<s%> and the <S%H4146>foundations<s%> of the <S%H8398>world<s%> were <S%H1540>discovered<s%> at your <S%H1606>rebuke,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> at the <S%H5397>blast<s%> of the <S%H7307>breath<s%> of your <S%H639>nostrils.<s%>
He <S%H7971>sent<s%> from <S%H4791>above,<s%> he <S%H3947>took<s%> me, he <S%H4871>drew<s%> me out of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4325>waters.<s%>
He <S%H5337>delivered<s%> me from my <S%H5794>strong<s%> <S%H341>enemy,<s%> and from them which <S%H8130>hated<s%> me: for they were too <S%H553>strong<s%> for me.
They <S%H6923>prevented<s%> me in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of my <S%H343>calamity:<s%> but the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was my <S%H4937>stay.<s%>
He <S%H3318>brought<s%> me <S%H3318>forth<s%> also into a <S%H4800>large<s%> <S%H4800>place;<s%> he <S%H2502>delivered<s%> me, <S%H3588>because<s%> he <S%H2654>delighted<s%> in me.
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1580>rewarded<s%> me according to my <S%H6664>righteousness;<s%> according to the <S%H1252>cleanness<s%> of my <S%H3027>hands<s%> has he <S%H7725>recompensed<s%> me.
For I have <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and have not <S%H7561>wickedly<s%> departed from my <S%H430>God.<s%>
For <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H4941>judgments<s%> were <S%H5048>before<s%> me, and I did not <S%H5493>put<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> his <S%H2708>statutes<s%> from me.
I was also <S%H8549>upright<s%> <S%H5973>before<s%> him, and I <S%H8104>kept<s%> myself from my <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>

Therefore has the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7725>recompensed<s%> me according to my <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> according to the <S%H1252>cleanness<s%> of my <S%H3027>hands<s%> in his <S%H5869>eyesight.<s%>
With the <S%H2623>merciful<s%> you will show yourself <S%H2616>merciful;<s%> with an <S%H8549>upright<s%> <S%H1397>man<s%> you will show yourself <S%H8549>upright;<s%>
With the <S%H1305>pure<s%> you will show yourself <S%H1305>pure;<s%> and with the <S%H6141>fraudulent<s%> you will show yourself <S%H6617>devious.<s%>
For you will <S%H3467>save<s%> the <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> <S%H5971>people;<s%> but will <S%H8213>bring<s%> <S%H8213>down<s%> <S%H7311>high<s%> <S%H5869>looks.<s%>
For you will <S%H215>light<s%> my <S%H5216>candle:<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H5050>enlighten<s%> my <S%H2822>darkness.<s%>
For by you I have <S%H7323>run<s%> through a <S%H1416>troop;<s%> and by my <S%H430>God<s%> have I <S%H1801>leaped<s%> over a <S%H7791>wall.<s%>

As for <S%H410>God,<s%> his <S%H1870>way<s%> is <S%H8549>perfect:<s%> the <S%H565>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H6884>tried:<s%> he is a <S%H4043>buckler<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> those that <S%H2620>trust<s%> in him.
For <S%H4310>who<s%> is <S%H433>God<s%> <S%H1107>save<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD?<s%> or <S%H4310>who<s%> is a <S%H6697>rock<s%> <S%H2108>save<s%> our <S%H430>God?<s%>
It is <S%H410>God<s%> that <S%H247>girds<s%> me with <S%H2428>strength,<s%> and <S%H5414>makes<s%> my <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H8549>perfect.<s%>
He <S%H7737>makes<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%> like <S%H355>hinds'<s%> <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and <S%H5975>sets<s%> me on my <S%H1116>high<s%> places.
He <S%H3925>teaches<s%> my <S%H3027>hands<s%> to <S%H4421>war,<s%> so that a <S%H7198>bow<s%> of <S%H5154>steel<s%> is <S%H5181>broken<s%> by my <S%H2220>arms.<s%>

You have also <S%H5414>given<s%> me the <S%H4043>shield<s%> of your <S%H3468>salvation:<s%> and your <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> has <S%H5582>held<s%> me up, and your <S%H6038>gentleness<s%> has made me <S%H7235>great.<s%>
You have <S%H7337>enlarged<s%> my <S%H6806>steps<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> me, that my <S%H7166>feet<s%> did not <S%H4571>slip.<s%>
I have <S%H7291>pursued<s%> my <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and <S%H5381>overtaken<s%> them: <S%H3808>neither<s%> did I <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> they were <S%H3615>consumed.<s%>
I have <S%H4272>wounded<s%> them that they were not <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H6965>rise:<s%> they are <S%H5307>fallen<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> my <S%H7272>feet.<s%>
For you have <S%H247>girded<s%> me with <S%H2428>strength<s%> to the <S%H4421>battle:<s%> you have <S%H3766>subdued<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> me those that <S%H6965>rose<s%> up against me.
You have also <S%H5414>given<s%> me the <S%H6203>necks<s%> of my <S%H341>enemies;<s%> that I might <S%H6789>destroy<s%> them that <S%H8130>hate<s%> me.
They <S%H7768>cried,<s%> but there was <S%H369>none<s%> to <S%H3467>save<s%> them: even to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> but he <S%H6030>answered<s%> them not.

Then did I <S%H7833>beat<s%> them small as the <S%H6083>dust<s%> <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H7307>wind:<s%> I did <S%H7324>cast<s%> them out as the <S%H2916>dirt<s%> in the <S%H2351>streets.<s%>

You have <S%H6403>delivered<s%> me from the <S%H7379>strivings<s%> of the <S%H5971>people;<s%> and you have <S%H7760>made<s%> me the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen:<s%> a <S%H5971>people<s%> whom I have not <S%H3045>known<s%> shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> me.
As soon as they <S%H8085>hear<s%> of me, they shall <S%H8085>obey<s%> me: the <S%H1121>strangers<s%> <S%H5236><s%> shall <S%H3584>submit<s%> themselves to me.
The <S%H1121>strangers<s%> <S%H5236><s%> shall <S%H5034>fade<s%> away, and be <S%H2727>afraid<s%> out of their <S%H4526>close<s%> places.
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2416>lives;<s%> and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> be my <S%H6697>rock;<s%> and let the <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H3468>salvation<s%> be <S%H7311>exalted.<s%>
It is <S%H410>God<s%> that <S%H5414>avenges<s%> <S%H5360><s%> me, and <S%H1696>subdues<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> me.

He <S%H6403>delivers<s%> me from my <S%H341>enemies:<s%> <S%H637>yes,<s%> you <S%H7311>lift<s%> me up above those that <S%H6965>rise<s%> up against me: you have <S%H5337>delivered<s%> me from the <S%H2555>violent<s%> <S%H376>man.<s%>
<S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> will I give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to you, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> and sing praises to your <S%H8034>name.<s%>

<S%H1431>Great<s%> <S%H3444>deliverance<s%> gives he to his <S%H4428>king;<s%> and <S%H6213>shows<s%> <S%H2617>mercy<s%> to his <S%H4899>anointed,<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> and to his <S%H2233>seed<s%> for ever <S%H5769>more.<s%>
